Reviews.Content: travelled barcelona time knowing expect hotel clean quiet friendly importantly believe lucky perfectly located direction las ramblas placa catalunya spot top metro else trip enjoy barcalona offer stay ideally located perfect staying overnight breakfast set day oh autobus airport stops top road 23 mins return summer stay

Reviews.Title: “La Rumbler”
Reviews.Author: Patty M
Reviews.Content: clean modest outstanding location subway steps catalunya square la rambla la refers subway delivering mild earthquake 20 minutes seriously sleep issue sleep tour subway stopped running midnight noted wifi rarely breakfast buffet worth cost staff friendly helpful arranging multiple tours price cant beat location easy access

Reviews.Title: “Good location, spacious room”

Reviews.Content: main reasons picked hotel location availability free wifi wifi wasnt night stayed isnt freely available barcelona starbucks door wifi wasnt doing positive note found staff friendly helpful spacious clean slept safe bit laptop

Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: cubanbreeze
Reviews.Content: barcelona stayed 3 nights hotel gran hotel ideal location walking distance front hear traffic etc earplugs idea metro runs hotel hear plus feel slight vibration soon notice especially bathroom bit squeeze getting door lucky breakfast substantial nice eat usual continental fruit cereal pastries rolls scrambled egg bacon breakfast dinning food drinks bar restaurant hotel comfy seating tv computer free internet plus free wifi nice tea facilities plenty coffe shops close nice hotel friendly staff ideal sleep etc day sightseeing

Reviews.Content: aerobus airport city centre de catalunya hotel 1 minute walk round corner stress tiny unromantic size 3 double beds tea coffee facilities staff spoke english helpfull hotel clean
